name: Lila 'Red' Moreno
traits: Resourceful, brave, quick-thinking, loyal, compassionate, skilled in hacking and negotiation
background: A teenage courier on the Neo-Earth colony, raised by her scientist grandmother after losing her parents. Known as 'Red' on the streets, she has a reputation for surviving the city’s toughest districts.
motivation: Deliver the secret data drive to her grandmother to expose WOLF Corp’s crimes and save her only remaining family.

name: Dr. Marisol Moreno (Grandmother)
traits: Intelligent, tenacious, protective, secretive, ailing but determined
background: A renowned researcher formerly affiliated with WOLF Corp, now in hiding at the Outer Rim Research Facility. She is a whistleblower with evidence of WOLF’s illegal experiments.
motivation: Expose WOLF’s crimes and secure her granddaughter’s safety, while developing nanomedicine to cure herself and others.

name: Agent Lycan (The Cyberwolf)
traits: Ruthless, relentless, cunning, physically imposing, cybernetically enhanced, skilled interrogator
background: Elite agent for WOLF Corporation, heavily augmented with AI-driven enhancements and known as 'Cyberwolf'. Driven by ambition and loyalty to WOLF.
motivation: Retrieve the data drive for WOLF, erase evidence, eliminate witnesses, and secure a personal promotion.

name: Axel
background: Head of a covert group fighting against WOLF Corp and rogue AIs in the city’s underbelly. Has never met Lila before the events of the story.
motivation: Protect fellow rebels, dismantle WOLF’s control, and safeguard the colony’s future from AI abuses.

name: Officer Rhodes
background: Stationed at the Red Zone perimeter, responsible for maintaining order and screening entrants. Unfamiliar with Lila initially.
motivation: Maintain security and protocol at the perimeter, keep unauthorized individuals out of restricted areas.

name: Junk Dealer
background: Operates in the city’s neon-lit alleys, trading in contraband and information. Willing to deal with anyone for the right price.
motivation: Profit from deals, avoid trouble with both rebels and WOLF operatives.

name: Street Vendor
background: A small-time vendor working near the Red Zone. Accidentally becomes involved by witnessing Lila’s passage.
motivation: Stay safe from WOLF’s enforcers, keep his business running.

name: Rebel Technician
background: Member of Axel’s rebel group, responsible for technical support and sabotage of WOLF systems.
motivation: Undermine WOLF’s surveillance and defense systems, support the rebel cause.

name: WOLF Security Officer (Facility Gate)
background: Guard at the Outer Rim facility’s gate, tasked with checking credentials and preventing unauthorized access.
motivation: Prevent breaches in facility security, protect WOLF’s interests.

name: Rebel Scout
background: Operates as a scout for Axel’s group, specializing in reconnaissance and early warning.
motivation: Ensure the safety of the rebels, report threats, aid new allies like Lila.

name: Rebel Medic
background: Provides medical assistance to wounded rebels and allies, familiar with underground medicine.
motivation: Protect the health of the rebel group, help those harmed by WOLF’s actions.

name: WOLF Drone AI
background: WOLF Corp’s autonomous surveillance and enforcement units, deployed throughout the city and its perimeter.
motivation: Enforce WOLF Corp’s control, track and apprehend intruders.

name: Spider-Bot Swarm
background: Small spider-like drones deployed by Lycan to track and capture targets.
motivation: Locate and capture Lila, neutralize threats to WOLF Corp.
